executive_summary.overview: Security assessment discovered 6 vulnerabilities across Tesla's infrastructure.
executive_summary.business_impact: Medium to high risk vulnerabilities requiring immediate attention to prevent potential security incidents.
executive_summary.bounty_recommendation: Total bounty recommendation: $5,400 based on severity and exploit potential.

findings.title: Clickjacking Vulnerability
findings.description:
A clickjacking vulnerability was discovered on tesla.com. 
The application lacks proper clickjacking protection mechanisms, 
allowing malicious websites to embed the target in invisible iframes 
and potentially trick users into performing unintended actions.
findings.proof_of_concept:
Clickjacking Proof of Concept

Demonstrates that tesla.com can be embedded in an iframe:

Vulnerability Confirmed: Site loads without clickjacking protection.
findings.impact_assessment:
HIGH IMPACT:
- Potential for financial loss through UI manipulation
- User trust and reputation damage
- Regulatory compliance violations
- Competitive disadvantage in marketplace
findings.remediation:
IMMEDIATE REMEDIATION:
1. Add X-Frame-Options header:
   X-Frame-Options: DENY

2. Implement CSP frame-ancestors:
   Content-Security-Policy: frame-ancestors 'none';

3. Test iframe embedding attempts are blocked.

VALIDATION:
- Confirm site cannot be embedded in iframe
- Verify headers are present on all responses
- Test across different browsers and devices

findings.title: Missing_Csp Vulnerability
findings.description:
Content Security Policy header is missing on tesla.com. 
This absence allows execution of unauthorized scripts and increases 
the risk of cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks and content injection.
findings.proof_of_concept:
<script>
// XSS Test Payload - tesla.com
// This would be blocked by proper CSP implementation
alert('XSS would execute without CSP on tesla.com');
</script>
findings.impact_assessment:
MEDIUM IMPACT:
- Security posture weakness affecting user confidence
- Potential for data exposure or session hijacking
- Compliance and regulatory concerns
- Impact on brand reputation
findings.remediation:
IMMEDIATE REMEDIATION:
1. Add Content-Security-Policy header:
   Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self';

2. Start with report-only mode for testing:
   Content-Security-Policy-Report-Only: default-src 'self';

3. Monitor CSP reports and tighten policy over time.

VALIDATION:
- Confirm CSP header is present
- Test XSS payloads are blocked
- Monitor CSP violation reports

findings.title: Missing_Security_Headers Vulnerability
findings.description: Security vulnerability discovered on tesla.com: missing_security_headers
findings.proof_of_concept: Proof of concept for missing_security_headers on tesla.com
findings.impact_assessment:
LOW IMPACT:
- Minor security weakness requiring attention
- Information disclosure risks
- Best practices compliance issues
findings.remediation: Implement security best practices for missing_security_headers
